judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed at appellant’s costs on the able opinion of the hearing judge whose comprehensive findings are fully supported by the evidence, were confirmed by the court en banc on exceptions thereto and well justify the legal conclusions which produced the final decree.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Franlc, F. Truscott, with him George Ghimples, Lewis M. Stevens, and Straclley, Ronon, Stevens & Young, for appellant.
David F. Mawwell, with him Herbert A. Fogel, and Edmonds, Obermayer & Rebmann, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Rentschler Estate.
Argued January 14, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Franlc, F. Truscott, with him George Ghimples, Lewis M. Stevens, and Straclley, Ronon, Stevens & Young, for appellant.
David F. Mawwell, with him Herbert A. Fogel, and Edmonds, Obermayer & Rebmann, for appellee.
March 17, 1958:
